comment.author: 34952904@N08
comment._content:
You need more photos of  historical Pensacola, Florida on your site.  I'm from that area and I didn't see anything about the Hotel San Carlos or Seville Square.  I would love to see more early pictures of the area on Flickr.

Thanks, Gloria Manna

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your suggestion, gloria.manna! Although we currently have only a small selection of the photos from the Archives available on Flickr, we do have more images of Pensacola on our Florida Memory site, including images of Hotel San Carlos and Seville Square. More images of historic Pensacola will be coming to Flickr soon!
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 22195283@N00
comment._content: I worked in pulp and paper all my life. Have been retired since 1994.
